fact.description: The first-half is just kicking off.
Carlos Velasco Carballo awards Colombia a goal kick.
Carlos Velasco Carballo signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Carlos Velasco Carballo signals a throw-in for Brazil, close to Colombia's area.

Free kick Brazil.

Brazil's Neymar misses with an attempt on goal.
Colombia have a goal kick.

Ball safe as Colombia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Carlos Velasco Carballo.
Great play from Neymar to set up the goal.

Carlos Velasco Carballo signals a free kick to Colombia.
Colombia's Fredy Guarin breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
